BaseStationInfo

Holds information (read from eeprom) about a BaseStation.

Functions
BaseStationInfo
BaseStationInfo(
const BaseStation_Impl *base
)

Creates a BaseStationInfo object from a BaseStation.

Parameters
base
const BaseStation_Impl*

The BaseStation_Impl to get the info for.

Exceptions

  • Error_Communication: Failed to read the value from the BaseStation.

  • Error_Connection: A connection error has occurred with the parent BaseStation.

BaseStationInfo
BaseStationInfo(
Version fw,
WirelessModels::BaseModel model,
WirelessTypes::RegionCode region,
const Version &asppVer_lxrs,
const Version &asppVer_lxrsPlus
)

Creates a BaseStationInfo object.

Parameters
fw
Version

The firmware Version of the BaseStation.

model
WirelessModels::BaseModel

The WirelessModels::BaseModel of the BaseStation.

region
WirelessTypes::RegionCode

The WirelessTypes::RegionCode of the BaseStation.

protocol_lxrs

The WirelessProtocol of the BaseStation for the LXRS Radio Configuration.

protocol_lxrsPlus

The WirelessProtocol of the BaseStation for the LXSR+ Radio Configuration.

Variables
m_firmwareVersion
mutable boost::optional<Version> m_firmwareVersion

The firmware Version of the BaseStation.

m_model
mutable boost::optional<WirelessModels::BaseModel> m_model

The WirelessModels::BaseModel of the BaseStation.

m_regionCode
mutable boost::optional<WirelessTypes::RegionCode> m_regionCode

The WirelessTypes::RegionCode of the BaseStation.

m_protocol_lxrs
mutable boost::optional<WirelessProtocol> m_protocol_lxrs

The WirelessProtocol of the BaseStation for the LXRS Radio Configuration.

m_protocol_lxrsPlus
mutable boost::optional<WirelessProtocol> m_protocol_lxrsPlus

The WirelessProtocol of the BaseStation for the LXRS+ Radio Configuration.
